name: Slow Rise
description:
A brief adventure game. This game builds challenging terrain through the stacking of models, and you can pass it by moving and jumping. This game does not have a save function. Once you accidentally stumble and fall, you can only return to the starting point.

I added a controller, but I am not sure if it is valid (*╹▽╹*).

Only keyboard and mouse operations are supported.

How to save money by playing with works?
The standard selling price of the game is $5, and it will be reduced to $3 during the discount period. If you want to save your money, you can purchase after seeing the price reduction label.

What should I do if I don't like this work?
You can post negative reviews in the comments section and submit a refund request to customer service.

MSX works. Thank you for your visit.
